posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.

I had a couple offers on the Old Mill on ebay and didn't quite make a deal because of the ebay fees.  Figured I'd put it up here in case either person is a net54 member

EDPG $300 (firm)
Old Mill $1000 SOLD
Great cards, Luke. HOF Portraits are on fire, let alone with rare backs.
bump for a new pair of cards
